participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: hardworking, practical, and caring, with a love for animals and construction.
participant_1.background: my dad taught me everything i know. i'm a construction worker. my cats are very special to me. i've 5 cats. i enjoy building houses.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: creative, adventurous, and passionate about art and culture.
participant_2.background: i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i'm an art major in college. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i visit europe twice a year.
